mapper.insert: insert into dt_instance (user_id, task_id, instance_id, doTime, comptime, dtstatus) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{instanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{dotime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select dt_instid, user_id, task_id, instance_id from dt_instance
select * from dt_instance where user_id = #{userId} and task_id = #{taskId} and instance_id = #{instanceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into dt_instance
dt_instid,
user_id,
task_id,
instance_id,
doTime,
comptime,
dtstatus,
